titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct the enrollment of H. R. 1417.
A concurrent resolution to correct the enrollment of H. R. 1417.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Sensenbrenner moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty mintues of debate on S. Con. Res. 145.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1417 (Copyright Royalty and Distribution Reform Act of 2004), including to provide that such Act shall apply to proceedings to determine royalty rates for the secondary transmission of primary transmissions by satellite carriers that are commenced after January 31, 2006.
